Character

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Character.Character
      • Character.Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BulletBill, Koopa, PiranhaPlant, Thwomp

    public class Enemy
extends Character
    Extends the Character class to create Enemies

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(int x,
             int y,
             int width,
             int height,
             boolean solid,
             java.lang.String imageName,
             Game game)
        Parameters:
        x - The x location on the Gameboard
        y - The y location on the Gameboard
        width - width of border collision rectangle (typically width of the image)
        height - height of border collision rectangle (typically height of the image)
        solid - True if border collision should be calculated
        imageName - The filename of the Character's ImageIcon
        game - The instance of the Game
